skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Good Knowledge in ReactJS, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experience in developing responsive web applications.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Experience in developing RESTful APIs using NodeJS and Express. Good knowledge in MongoDB and Firebase.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Experience in designing user interfaces and user experiences for web applications using Figma.

skills.title: Python
skills.description: Experience in developing games using Pygame and good knowledge in Python and Django.

portfolio.title: DormDen
portfolio.description: Designed and developed a full-stack hostel search application, DormDen, using React, Express, MongoDB, and NodeJS.

portfolio.title: FreeKick
portfolio.description: A football game using pygame where the player has to score goals without collision with the players having random movement speed.

portfolio.title: Expense Tracker
portfolio.description: A simple expense tracker app using ReactJS and Firebase. It allows users to add, delete, and update expenses.
